---
title: Classifying OSM Data
---


```{r}
remotes::install_github("nptscot/osmactive")
remotes::install_cran("osmextract")
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tmap)
tmap_mode("view")
```


```{r}
study_area_route = stplanr::route(
    from = "Glasgow Queen Street",
    to = "University of Glasgow",
    route_fun = stplanr::route_osrm
)
study_area_line = stplanr::line2points(study_area_route) |>
  mutate(id = 1:2) |>
  od::points_to_odl() |>
  slice(2)
study_area_buffer = sf::st_buffer(study_area_line, dist = 1000) |>
  rmapshaper::ms_simplify()
```


```{r}
#| label: study_area
#| fig-cap: Study area
tm_shape(study_area_buffer) +
  tm_borders() +
  tm_shape(study_area_route) +
  tm_lines(lwd = 2, col = "red")
```
